abstract: NBA officials and players' union are hopeful that end to lockout may be in sight after seven-and-a-half hour bargaining session.
snippet: After seven more hours of talks, officials for the league and the players union are hopeful the end to the lockout may be closer.
lead_paragraph: After seven more hours of talks, officials for the league and the players union are hopeful the end to the lockout may be closer.

headline.main: Cautious Optimism, but No Deal, as N.B.A. Talks Break for Night
headline.print_headline: Cautious Optimism, but No Deal, as N.B.A. Talks Break for Night
headline.seo: For the N.B.A., Negotiations Are Taking ‘Baby Steps’
